span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that help you trace the execution of your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用的屬性和方法中的類別檢測版本來建置。You can use the properties and methods in the class to instrument release builds. 檢測可讓您監視您在現實中執行的應用程式的健全狀況。Instrumentation allows you to monitor the health of your application running in real-life settings. 追蹤可協助您隔離問題，並加以修正，而不會影響執行中的系統。Tracing helps you isolate problems and fix them without disturbing a running system. 這個類別會提供方法以顯示 對話方塊中，並發出判斷提示，以將始終。This class provides methods to display an dialog box, and to emit an assertion that will always . 這個類別會提供寫入方法，下列變化中： ， ， ，和。This class provides write methods in the following variations: , , , and . 和類別提供以動態方式控制追蹤輸出的方式。The and classes provide means to dynamically control the tracing output. 您可以修改這些參數的值，不需要重新編譯您的應用程式。You can modify the values of these switches without recompiling your application. 如需使用組態檔來設定參數資訊，請參閱類別和[How to:建立、 初始化和設定追蹤參數](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md)主題。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see the class and the [How to: Create, Initialize and Configure Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md) topic. 您可以藉由新增自訂的追蹤輸出的目標執行個體，或移除執行個體從集合。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding instances to or removing instances from the collection. 集合由兩者共用而類別; 新增任一類別的追蹤接聽程式將接聽程式加入至兩者。The collection is shared by both the and the classes; adding a trace listener to either class adds the listener to both. 根據預設，追蹤輸出，就會發出使用類別。By default, trace output is emitted using the class. > [!NOTE] > 加入追蹤接聽程式，集合可能會導致在追蹤時擲回例外狀況，如果追蹤接聽程式所使用的資源無法使用。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 條件並擲回的例外狀況取決於追蹤接聽程式，並無法在本主題中列舉。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 它可能會很有用的呼叫置於中的方法`try` / `catch`來偵測並處理從追蹤接聽項的任何例外狀況區塊。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. > [!NOTE] > 如果您將追蹤接聽項新增至部分信任程式碼時，您會收到例外狀況，因為加入追蹤接聽程式需要權限。If you add trace listeners to partially trusted code, you will get a exception, because adding trace listeners requires permission. 若要追蹤 Visual Studio 中的沙箱中執行部分信任程式碼，請勿加入追蹤接聽項。To trace partially trusted code that is running in a sandbox in Visual Studio, do not add trace listeners. 相反地，檢視並中的訊息**輸出**視窗。Instead, view the and messages in the **Output** window. 類別提供屬性，以取得或設定的層級，則，以及是否要之後每次寫入。The class provides properties to get or set the level of , the , and whether to after each write. 若要設定並如，您可以編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To set the and for , you can edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 組態檔的格式應該類似下列的範例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` 屬性會套用至方法的。The attribute is applied to the methods of . 支援的編譯器忽略這些方法的呼叫，除非 「 追蹤 」 定義為條件式編譯符號。Compilers that support ignore calls to these methods unless "TRACE" is defined as a conditional compilation symbol. 請參閱編譯器的文件，以判斷是否支援，以及定義條件式編譯符號的語法。Refer to a compiler's documentation to determine whether is supported and the syntax for defining a conditional compilation symbol. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio 專案中，根據預設，"DEBUG"條件式編譯符號定義偵錯組建，而且已定義 「 追蹤 」 符號，同時偵錯和發行組建。In Visual Studio projects, by default, the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol is defined for debug builds, and the "TRACE" symbol is defined for both debug and release builds. 如需有關如何停用此行為的資訊，請參閱 Visual Studio 文件。For information about how to disable this behavior, see the Visual Studio documentation. 若要定義的 「 追蹤 」 的條件式編譯符號在 C# 中，新增`/d:TRACE`至編譯器命令列選項，當您編譯您的程式碼使用命令列，或新增`#define TRACE`至檔案頂端。To define the "TRACE" conditional compilation symbol in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` option to the compiler command line when you compile your code using a command line, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，新增`/d:TRACE=True`至編譯器命令列選項，或新增`#Const TRACE=True`檔案。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` option to the compiler command line or add `#Const TRACE=True` to the file. 不支援 c + + 編譯器。 is not supported by the C++ compiler. 若要提供對等的功能，您必須將方法呼叫中`#if defined(TRACE) ... #endif`區塊，並加入`/DTRACE`至編譯器命令列選項，或新增`#define TRACE`檔案。To provide equivalent functionality, you must enclose calls to the methods of in an `#if defined(TRACE) ... #endif` block, and add the `/DTRACE` option to the compiler command line or add `#define TRACE` to the file. ## Examples 下列範例會使用表示開頭和結尾的程式執行。The following example uses to indicate the beginning and the end of a program's execution. 此範例也會使用和來區別追蹤輸出的方法。The example also uses the and methods to distinguish the tracing output. 如需更完整的使用範例，請參閱[How to:將追蹤陳述式新增至應用程式程式碼](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-add-trace-statements-to-application-code.md)。For a more complete example of the use of , see [How to: Add Trace Statements to Application Code](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-add-trace-statements-to-application-code.md). [!code-cpp[Classic Trace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Trace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Trace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，如果您想要在版本中的判斷提示。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 方法只適用於偵錯組建。The method works only in debug builds. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[受控碼中的判斷提示](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed Code](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code). 一般而言，方法用來找出程式開發期間的邏輯錯誤。Typically, the method is used to identify logic errors during program development. 評估條件。 evaluates the condition. 如果結果是`false`，它會傳送失敗訊息給集合。If the result is `false`, it sends a failure message to the collection. 您可以自訂此行為，藉由新增，或移除其中一個，集合。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or removing one from, the collection. 當應用程式在使用者介面模式下，它會顯示訊息方塊，顯示呼叫堆疊與檔案和行號。When the application runs in user-interface mode, it displays a message box that shows the call stack with file and line numbers. 訊息方塊包含三個按鈕：**中止**，**重試**，以及**忽略**。The message box contains three buttons: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore**. 按一下 **中止**按鈕終止應用程式。Clicking the **Abort** button terminates the application. 按一下 **重試**您傳送到偵錯工具中的程式碼，如果您的應用程式正在執行以偵錯工具，或如果不是開啟偵錯工具會提供。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 按一下 **忽略**會繼續進行下一個指令程式碼中。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > 訊息方塊的顯示取決於是否存在。The display of the message box depends on the presence of the . 如果不是處於集合，訊息方塊不會顯示。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以藉由移除[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，則[<移除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，或藉由呼叫方法屬性 (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`)。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 您可以變更的行為在組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。You can change the behavior of the in the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，您可以啟用和停用判斷提示訊息方塊或設定屬性。In this file, you can enable and disable the assert message box or set the property. 組態檔的格式應該如下：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ``` ## Examples 下列範例會建立陣列的索引。The following example creates an index for an array. 然後會執行一些動作，設定索引的值。Then some action is performed that sets the value of the index. 接下來的程式碼會呼叫來驗證索引值是否有效。Next the code calls to verify the index value is valid. 如果不是有效的輸出呼叫堆疊。If it is not valid, the outputs the call stack. [!code-cpp[Classic Trace.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Assert Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Trace.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Assert Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Trace.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Trace.Assert Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: if is called on the after every write; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設為 `false`。The default is `false`. 排清資料流不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call or . 設定至`true`表示資料會從排清緩衝區資料流，但並不會清除編碼器的狀態。Setting to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 這可讓編碼器，讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊保持其狀態 （部分的字元）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. UTF8，UTF7，其中某些字元可以只編碼編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元後，會影響此案例。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. 若要設定並如，您也可以編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To set the and for , you can also edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 組態檔的格式應該類似下列的範例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，輸出會寫入執行個體。By default, the output is written to an instance of . 這個方法會呼叫追蹤接聽項的方法。This method calls the method of the trace listener. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 提供量身訂做的 Web 網頁的追蹤功能。ASP.NET supplies tracing functionality tailored for Web pages. 若要將追蹤訊息寫入 ASP.NET 頁面中，使用屬性。To write trace messages in ASP.NET pages, use the property. 根據預設，在 ASP.NET 網頁，陳述式相關聯的程式碼`Trace.Write("...")`會呼叫方法屬性。By default, in code associated with an ASP.NET Web page, the statement `Trace.Write("...")` is a call to the method of the property. 若要使用類別 Web pages，您必須包含命名空間，例如， `System.Diagnostics.Trace.Write("...")`。To use the class in Web pages, you must include the namespace, for example, `System.Diagnostics.Trace.Write("...")`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立名為`generalSwitch`。The following example creates a named `generalSwitch`. 此參數會設定外部程式碼範例。This switch is set outside the code sample. 如果參數設定為`Error`或更新版本中，範例會輸出的名字`value`參數來。If the switch is set to the `Error` or higher, the example outputs the first name of the `value` parameter to the . 如需新增接聽程式資訊集合，請參閱類別。For information on adding a listener to the collection, see the class. 然後，如果設為`Verbose`，範例會輸出第一則訊息的同一行上的訊息。Then, if the is set to `Verbose`, the example outputs a message on the same line as the first message. 第二個訊息後面接著行結束字元。The second message is followed by a line terminator.
